Name: Vertical Filing Cabinet, 2 drawer, unanchored laterally

GeneralInformation.Description: Filing cabinet, unanchored laterally.  Cabinet has 2 drawers and is 15" deep x 24" tall. Median demand based on FEMA P58 Vol3 Background Documentation 3.9.12 A11 and an assumption of W/H = 0.625. Dispersion is a generic 0.5. Repair cost and time assumes that only 10% of the cabinets will experience damage and the repair work mainly involves replacing/refiling the contents.
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Filing cabinet falls over and contents are scattered.  Likely damage to file cabinet.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace filing cabinet and refile / replace contents.
